sources.name: preDimTime
sources.description: union accounting month end and policy qtr end.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		capital as string,
		branch as string,
		hrg as string,
		amount_usd as long,
		account as string,
		cc_reporting_period as long,
		agr_reporting_period as long,
		date_from as date,
		date_to as date,
		inc_year as string,
		fin_year as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.agr_agresso_trans where account in ( 46503, 46506, 46603, 46507, 47503)',
	format: 'query') ~> agressoTrans
source(output(
		amount_net_usd as long,
		amount_gross_usd as long,
		branch as string,
		inc_year as string,
		fin_year as short,
		date_to as date,
		hrg as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select amount_net_usd,\namount_gross_usd,\nbranch_code as branch,\ncast(inc_year as varchar(4)) as inc_year,\nfin_year, \ntransaction_date as date_to,\nhrg from\ndwh_stage.sta_manual_result_trans',
	format: 'query') ~> staManualResultTrans
source(output(
		date_to as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select accounting_month_end_date as date_to from dwh_stage.sta_dim_time\nunion\nselect \npolicy_qtr_end_date as date_to from dwh_stage.sta_dim_time',
	format: 'query') ~> preDimTime
agressoTrans derive(amount_gross_usd = case(
    account!='47503',
    coalesce(amount_usd,0), 
    toLong(0)),
		amount_ri_usd = case(
    account=='47503', 
    amount_usd, 
    toLong(0)
    )) ~> grossRiAmount
grossRiAmount aggregate(groupBy(branch,
		hrg,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year),
	amount_gross_usd = sum(amount_gross_usd),
		amount_ri_usd = sum(amount_ri_usd)) ~> sumAmounts
sumAmounts derive(amount_net_usd = coalesce(amount_gross_usd,0)+coalesce(amount_ri_usd,0)) ~> netAmount
droppingColumns, staManualResultTrans union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
netAmount select(mapColumn(
		branch,
		hrg,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year,
		amount_gross_usd,
		amount_net_usd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> droppingColumns
UnionAll aggregate(groupBy(branch,
		hrg,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year),
	amount_usd = sum(amount_gross_usd),
		amount_net_usd = sum(amount_net_usd)) ~> sumAmountss
syntheticKeys, syntheticKey join(synthetic_key==synthetic_key2,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> carthesianproduct
sumAmountss select(mapColumn(
		branch,
		hrg,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year,
		amount_usd,
		amount_net_usd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> droppingColumnss
preDimTime derive(synthetic_key = 1) ~> syntheticKey
droppingColumnss derive(synthetic_key2 = 1) ~> syntheticKeys
droppingColumnsss, zeroamounts union(byName: true)~> Union1
droppingColumnssss aggregate(groupBy(hrg),
	each(match(name!='hrg'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Dedup
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		branch,
		hrg,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year,
		amount_usd,
		amount_net_usd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> droppingColumnssss
sumAmountss derive(amount_usd = 0,
		amount_net_usd = 0) ~> zeroamounts
carthesianproduct select(mapColumn(
		branch,
		hrg,
		inc_year,
		fin_year,
		amount_usd,
		amount_net_usd,
		date_to = preDimTime@date_to
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> droppingColumnsss
Dedup aggregate(groupBy(hrg,
		branch,
		date_to,
		inc_year,
		fin_year),
	amount_usd = sum(amount_usd),
		amount_net_usd = sum(amount_net_usd)) ~> sumAmountsss
sumAmountsss derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
